title: 94/469/EC: Commission Decision of 14 July 1994 amending Decision 94/269/EC laying down specific conditions for importing fishery and aquaculture products from Colombia
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 14 July 1994 amending Decision 94/269/EC laying down specific conditions for importing fishery and aquaculture products from Colombia (94/469/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annex B of Decision 94/269/EC is replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 July 1994.
For the Commission
René STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 15.
(2) OJ No L 115, 6. 5. 1994, p. 38.
(3) OJ No L 8, 11. 1. 1990, p. 70.
